attributes.action: put in place legislation for energy companies not to raise there prices above the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in other E.E.C. countries the energy companies are by law forced not to increase prices above the rate of inflation

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
 http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/northover1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
